transcript:
Customer: Hello
Halo
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Ji sir bataiye very good afternoon main baat baat kar raha tha India Mart se recorded line bataiye sir suno na.
Executive: Sir main India Mart ka app purchase kiya hai theek hai.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: To purchase karne ke baad mere ko ek bhi business nahi mila hai kuch response nahi aa raha hai.
Khali purchase ke liye mere ko na jab tak main purchase nahi kar raha tha na tab tak mere ko daily char se panch phone aata madam ka.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ek bar purchase karo uske baad turant aapko itna business milega ye milega wo milega aapko vyapar app milega vyapar app bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Vyapar app nahi aaya abhi.
Customer: Kuch nahi aaya sir kuch response nahi mil raha hai mere ko.
Executive: Aapko na whatsapp pe notification aaya hoga sir haan ji.
Customer: Unko main wahi bola mere ko ek ek kam karo mere ko refund de do mere ko nahi mangta hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Nahi isme agar isme vyapar app to aapko mil jayega sir vyapar app ki koi dikkat nahi main yahan se internal ticket raise kar deta hu vyapar app agar aapko chahiye to wo mil jayega aapko agar bola gaya usme to.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Vyapar app aapko usme mil jayega agar nahi mila hai to main yahan pe concern raise kar deta hu vyapar app aapko mil jayega isme.
Executive: Theek hai vyapar vyapar mil jayega uske alava bataiye kya concern aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Vyapar matlab aur dusra business kidhar aa raha hai mere ko business nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Sir business to aap inquiry consume karenge buyleads vagaira to usi ke against mein aapko milega abhi aapki.
Customer: Sab jaale.
Executive: To sir abhi aapki services ko one month bhi complete nahi hua na one month hi hua hai around.
Customer: To agar aap isko mere ko ek bhi response nahi aayega to kaise hoga sir.
Executive: Nahi kya kya issue aa raha hai aapne consume kiye hai buyleads jaise kal aapne consume ki thi white jo snow spray commercial use.
Customer: Suno na mera khud ka manufacturing hai barabar.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To manufacturing hai to ek ek cartoon do cartoon 10 cartoon main kaisa order le sir.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Mere ko 500 cartoon 1000 cartoon ka order aayega tabhi main manufacture chalega na sir main thodi retail wala hu.
Executive: Hmm. Nahi to sir isme bilkul agree haan bataiye.
Customer: Bada bada order aayega tabhi kam karega na sir ye 10 order panch order main kidhar bheju dusra district mein.
Executive: Sir dekhiye agar aap uske level pe jayenge to kya naam hai 20 cartoon ka bhi requirement hai 50 cartoon ka bhi requirement hai at least ye business use ke liye hai to itna to minimum aapko share karna padega 50 cartoon ki requirement hai aap dekho Madhya Pradesh se hai aapke.
Customer: Sir 20 25 ka order hai wo Madhya Pradesh ka hai mere Maharashtra mein apna office hai theek hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan to Maharashtra mein mera factory hai aur mere ko bahar apna state ko bhejne ka hai barabar 20 25 usko nahi parvadte sir apne ko bhi nahi parvadte wo bhi business nahi hota hai apna calculation nahi chalta hai.
Executive: Kitna chahiye aapko minimum order?
Customer: Minimum apna 300 400 500.
Executive: Achcha 500 cartoon to aap ye dekhiye ek 1500 cartoon ki requirement hai aap isko consume kijiye ye Uttar Pradesh se requirement hai reselling ke liye hi chahiye inko.
Customer: Wo UP wala na.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Uske sath kal baat kiya na maine.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Baat kiya hai maine na sir.
Executive: Kal aapne consume kahan kiya hai kal to aapne koi bhi consume nahi kiya.
Customer: Nahi to wo alag hai alag hai wo pattern.
Executive: Haan to wo alag hai wo alag hai sir aap usko consume kijiye kal to aapne Patna ka ek consume kiya tha hazar cartoon ka aap ye dekhiye kal to aapne Patna ka consume kiya tha hazar cartoon ka abhi 1500 cartoon ki requirement hai aap usko consume kijiye aapko ye particular agar bulk mein aap deal karte ho to bulk ka filter lagakar aap aaram se isko consume kar sakte ho sir abhi kyuki ye aapka bilkul season aayega abhi season aapke aas pass season ke aas pass sahi season aapke product ka aayega abhi pattern to isme abhi aap isme bulk agar aapko chahiye to bulk ka filter lagakar aapko consume kijiye sir.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai sir.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Bulk bol lijiye to.
Executive: Bulk filter haan ji bulk filter filter lagaiye aur ye aap ek keval ek snow spray me hi deal karte hai iske alava koi product nahi hai keval snow kya aap keval snow spray me hi aap deal karte hai iske alava bhi product nahi hai aapka.
Customer: Haan are bolo na.
Executive: Main keh raha hu sir aapka snow spray ka hi product hai keval iske alava bhi product hai aapke pass.
Customer: Ke alawa aap kya bole.
Executive: Ke alawa aapka ek hi product hai snow spray nahi deal karte ho aap.
Executive: Hello haan bolo awaaz aa rahi hai meri.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Sir awaaz aa rahi hai aapko snow spray ka hi hai.
Executive: Aapki voice break ho rahi hai meri awaaz aa rahi hai aapko.
Customer: Nahi single product hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received any business leads.

- Did not receive the Vyapar app.

- Wants a refund.

- Requires bulk orders, not small orders.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to raise an internal ticket for Vyapar app.

- Suggested using bulk filters to find larger orders.

- Executive mentioned a 1500 cartoon requirement from Uttar Pradesh.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, vyapar app, bulk orders
